title: Skip the Black Friday rush and grab a 15-inch MacBook Air for $250 off
content:
Macworld

Black Friday is always one of the best times to buy a new MacBook, but we can’t imagine any sale getting much better than this: Amazon is selling the 15-inch MacBook Air with 256GB of storage for $1,049 and the 512GB model for $1,299, a savings of $250 and the best price we’ve ever seen.

The 15-inch MacBook Air is Apple’s first 15-inch laptop since the Intel model was retired in 2019. It has a gorgeous Liquid Retina display flanked by incredibly slim bezels, and its thin and light design makes it easy to slip into a bag or backpack. You’ll also get a speedy M2 processor, all-day battery life, MagSafe for fast charging, and a pair of Thunderbolt ports. And of course, it’s running Sonoma and will get updates for years to come.  

In our 4.5-star review, we praised the “absolutely excellent processor” and “bright, sharp, and colorful” display, and loved the surprisingly affordable price. And at this discount, it’s nearly impossible to pass up.
